channel.title: Help with farcast

item.title: Help with farcast
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

i used a tut to make ice barrage spell attack when you wear ancient staffâ€¦ but it always runs up beside the opponent and casts it, help me make it so i can fc please?

here is the code.

public void Warlock999() {
hitDiff = 30 + misc.random(20);
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 1);
actionTimer = 50;
setAnimation(369);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
}

Code:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) // ancient staff
{
Warlock999();
return 1979;
}
